com.knowledgeplayers.grar.display.layout.Layout

type
class
Layout of the application

Constructor

new(?_name : String, ?_content : Zone, ?_fast : haxe.xml.Fast)
parameters
name : Name of the layout
content : Content of the layout
fast : XML description of the layout
Constructor

Instance Variables

content(getContent,null) : Zone

Content of the layout

name : String

Name of this layout

zones : Hash<Zone>

All the child zones of this layout
